rev.desc.rev.desc: If a device record is deleted then any list group it belongs to is updated and it is removed from the group's group.members array.
If the logical.name field is changed then all the groups that the configuration item belongs to is retrieved. Each list it belongs to is then updated to reflect the updated logical.name.
added a series of panels at the end to init the joinfile, retrieve the record, project the data and update the record. This will get the correct joinfile triggers to fire.

descript.descript: If a device record is deleted then any list group it belongs to is updated and it is removed from the group's group.members array.
If the logical.name field is changed then all the groups that the configuration item belongs to is retrieved. Each list it belongs to is then updated to reflect the updated logical.name.
added a series of panels at the end to init the joinfile, retrieve the record, project the data and update the record. This will get the correct joinfile triggers to fire.
